absorption_plot¶

sharp_modules.absorption_plot.abs_plot(spec_name, cfg_par)[source]¶

Plots spectra of all radio sources found by find_src_imsad saved in basedir/beam/abs/spec. Plots are stored in basedir/beam/abs/plot

IN
Spectra extracted by spec_ex
IN cfga
abs_ex_plot_xaxis= ‘ ‘ #: X-axis units [‘velocity’,’frequency’] abs_ex_plot_yaxis= ‘ ‘ #: Y axis units [‘flux’,’optical depth’] #: plots line at redshift of source in spectrum redshift must be stored in table of load_src_csv abs_ex_plot_redsrc= True abs_ex_plot_title= True #: plot title: J2000 name of radio source abs_ex_plot_format= ‘ ‘ #: format of plot [‘.pdf’,’.jpeg’,’.png’]
OUT
For each source outputs have the following name: J2000_xaxis-unit_yaxis-unit.plot_format = J220919.87+180920.17_vel_flux.pdf
sharp_modules.absorption_plot.create_all_abs_plots(cfg_par)[source]¶

Function to create all absorption plots

This function creates all absorption plots by calling abs_plot() for each source. Works as a kind of wrapper and is used by run_sharpener.py
